spine_hook: Raise full-price early-window buyer share to 20–30% while holding promo depth and event CPA ≤0.8× baseline, measured by paired tracking of buyer-share vs promo-intensity during Nov 18–Dec 02.

anchors.headline: Observed early-window buyer share (current baseline)
anchors.expression: Share of total holiday purchases occurring Nov 18–Dec 02 that are full-price and attributed to store-originated media/events

anchors.headline: Target foot-traffic uplift (base / stretch)
anchors.expression: Percent increase in visits during Nov 18–Dec 02 vs average daily visits in the two weeks before Nov 18 (base = 10–15%, stretch ≥25%)

anchors.headline: Event CPA ceiling (cost-efficiency guardrail)
anchors.expression: Total event-related spend (creator fees + incremental store cost + media) divided by full-price buyers acquired and reported relative to baseline channel CPA (target ≤0.8× baseline)

anchors.headline: QR redemption floor (attention to action)
anchors.expression: Unique QR code redemptions tied to in-store media or events divided by store footfall during Nov 18–Dec 02 (floor ≥5%)

measurement_plan.expression: Full-price transactions attributed to store events / total transactions during Nov 18–Dec 02. Attribution via event tags, POS source code, or unique QR scan linkbacks.
measurement_plan.why_it_matters: Direct test of the job story: increases in this share mean more experience-driven buyers, not deeper discounts.

measurement_plan.expression: Weighted average discount depth across promoted SKUs and share of transactions with any discount, measured daily and aggregated for the window.
measurement_plan.why_it_matters: Paired with M1 to prove buyer-share growth occurred without increasing promo depth or frequency.

measurement_plan.expression: Total event spend (creator fees + on-site ops + media) / full-price buyers attributed to the event. Report as x baseline CPA where baseline = average CPA for last pre-holiday period (owner to define baseline window).
measurement_plan.timeframe: Event window + 30 days for LTV follow-up
measurement_plan.why_it_matters: Ensures store-as-studio acquisition stays cost-efficient. Target ceiling ≤0.8× baseline CPA.

measurement_plan.expression: Unique QR redemptions linked to event or store media / measured store footfall, daily and aggregated for the window.
measurement_plan.why_it_matters: Checks that media-driven attention converts into measurable buyer signals. Target floor ≥5% of footfall.
